name: Thanks I hate It
description:
Thanks I Hate it Controls

Left Stick: Move
Right Stick: Look around
X: Pick up box
Right Trigger: Throw Box (Hold the release to increase velocity)

A on keyboard: Pause game

To start the game press "Exit" on the menu.
To see the credits page press "Thanks" on the menu
To exit press "Hate" on the menu which is hiding a secret exit button

May or may not have to exit by pausing and going back to main menu,
but it wouldn't be a game jam game if we gave you easy access to a quit button ;)

You hate each other so give each other the worst present
